description: This tab was unfortunately written for 8 string in GP and Songsterr won't have it. Sorry as I am new to this platform and didn't know it didn't support 8 string. Scales are therefore wrong :(. May end up re-writing and fixing it to be right for 7 string. This version may not be fully correct, but still should sound good...so enjoy it for now!
title: The Truth That Haunts A Cold Dark Night

description: - Fixed missing notes in 2nd chorus and 1 missing note 4 last in second bar of solo. Songsterr doesn't seem to have support for 8 string...
title: The Truth That Haunts A Cold Dark Night
